issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly homebrew-cpp job fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7105](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7105). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not clear (to me) which is the real error, but https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/609138711#L6672 seems to implicate aws-sdk-cpp, which was upgraded on homebrew-core a couple of days ago: https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/commits/master/Formula/aws-sdk-cpp.rb.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7105?focusedCommentId=16975511) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5846
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5846>
